fields.name: AlertType
fields.description: The value of the supported alert type. Supported alert type values are: servicehealth, metricstaticthreshold, metricsdynamicthreshold, logalertv2, smartalert, webtestalert, logalertv1numresult, logalertv1metricmeasurement, resourcehealth, activitylog, actualcostbudget, forecastedbudget

fields.name: ArmRoleReceivers
fields.description: The list of ARM role receivers that are part of this action group. Roles are Azure RBAC roles and only built-in roles are supported.

fields.name: AutomationRunbookReceivers
fields.description: The list of AutomationRunbook receivers that are part of this action group.

fields.name: AzureAppPushReceivers
fields.description: The list of AzureAppPush receivers that are part of this action group.

fields.name: AzureFunctionReceivers
fields.description: The list of azure function receivers that are part of this action group.

fields.name: EmailReceivers
fields.description: The list of email receivers that are part of this action group.

fields.name: EventHubReceivers
fields.description: The list of event hub receivers that are part of this action group.

fields.name: ItsmReceivers
fields.description: The list of ITSM receivers that are part of this action group.

fields.name: LogicAppReceivers
fields.description: The list of logic app receivers that are part of this action group.

fields.name: SmsReceivers
fields.description: The list of SMS receivers that are part of this action group.

fields.name: VoiceReceivers
fields.description: The list of voice receivers that are part of this action group.

fields.name: WebhookReceivers
fields.description: The list of webhook receivers that are part of this action group.
